title: Data Access & Integrations (v0)
purpose: Determine how external facts are sourced (tenant APIs vs TitleApp add-ons).

questions.prompt: Do you/fund already subscribe to any data services you want TitleApp to use?
List the services (e.g., CoStar, Reonomy, PitchBook, Preqin, Yardi, Argus exports, county portals, custom DB).
Do any of those services have an API we can use?
If yes, note which services + any auth method (API key, OAuth, IP allowlist).
Preferred way to ingest data if no API is available:
Enable First American Title add-on (monthly fee)?
